Summary John Kalvin is a marketing and sales leader with 17 years of experience delivering exceptional results at one of the world’s most successful and admired companies. John has expertise in the areas of Consumer Marketing, Shopper Marketing, Sales Management, Strategy Development and Channel Management. 
 
John has a passion for business, marketing and technology innovation and a track record of successful influence at the CEO level. In his most recent high profile program, John brought these passions together to develop The Intel Experience at Best Buy (http://www.bestbuy.com/theintelexperience). The ‘first of its kind’ program brings the excitement and impact of experiential marketing into the store! It not only delivers high impact brand impressions at the point of purchase, it is on the leading edge of the retail store transformation. 
 
In his current position, John is responsible for all aspects of Shopper Marketing across North America, spanning all major technology retailers, including Best Buy, Amazon.com, Staples, Costco, Walmart and many others. The portfolio of Shopper Marketing at Intel ranges from TV and digital marketing to create awareness and demand to online and in store tools to influence shoppers. In this role, John has transformed the role of North America Shopper Marketing at Intel to deliver exceptional business results. 
 
John’s greatest strength lies in his management and leadership approach. With over a decade of management experience, John has deep expertise in building and developing high output teams. He attracts top talent, continually raises the bar on performance expectations, executes with uncompromising ethics, builds collaborative relationships across organizations, communicates with clarity and consistently delivers results beyond expectations.
